featured_projects.name: WebSocket RealTime Chat App
featured_projects.description: A real-time distributed WebSocket chat backend designed to scale horizontally - leveraging cluster-wide pub-sub, request buffering and batched DB writes.

featured_projects.name: MeTube
featured_projects.description: A custom-built distributed video encoding backend inspired by YouTube - featuring chunked uploads, task queues, and worker nodes for scalable processing.
featured_projects.technologies: C/C++, RabbitMQ, Flask, Python, FFMPEG, MinIO/AWS S3

featured_projects.name: Project LocalDown
featured_projects.description: A Plex-like system for browsing locally downloaded Light Novels via a centralized UI - featuring a custom data scraper, multilingual full-text search engine, and client-side caching. Multi-device sync and LAN file access coming soon.
featured_projects.technologies: Python, Flask, TypeScript, React, PostgreSQL, BeautifulSoup

featured_projects.name: Japanese Light Novel OCR
featured_projects.description: A nifty program made to scan text from Japanese Light Novel page images and output text
